title: Shirahime-Syo
description: Legend says that when it snows, it is because the Snow Goddess is crying. From Clamp, creators of Chobits and Cardcaptor Sakura, comes a collection of five tragic tales, all connected by the bond of snow. Shirahime-Syo is Clamp's take on traditional Japanese from and storytelling. Featuring luscious watercolors and gentle brushstrokes, it is a beautiful departure from Clamp's usual fare. Discover for yourself the mystery behind the snow.
author: Clamp
